texto: documents and data For documents and data applicable to the specific case, the quality plan should state: a) how the documents and data will be identified; b) by whom the documents and data will be reviewed and approved; 6 © ISO 2005 – All rights reserved ISO 10005:2005(E) c) to whom the documents will be distributed, or their availability notified; ON-Download - Service, 11.11.2005, 856867-2, Quality Austria Trainings-, Zertifizierungs- und Begutachtungs GmbH, Gonzagagasse 1/24, A-1010 Wien d) how access to the documents and data can be obtained. 5.7 Control of records The quality plan should state what records should be established and how they will be maintained.
